ya4.1.2:11.1_0: Kāyadhātuṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso kāyo, na kāyadhātu.
ya4.1.2:14.1_0: Rūpadhātuṁ ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ rūpaṁ, na rūpadhātu.
ya4.1.2:18.1_0: Sīlagandho samādhigandho paññāgandho gandho, na gandhadhātu.
ya4.1.2:21.1_0: Attharaso dhammaraso vimuttiraso raso, na rasadhātu.
ya4.1.2:28.1_0: Manodhātuṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso mano, na manodhātu.
ya4.1.2:33.1_0: Dhammadhātuṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso dhammo, na dhammadhātu.
ya4.1.2:37.1_1: Cakkhuñca cakkhudhātuñca ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na ceva cakkhu na ca cakkhudhātu.
ya4.1.2:40.1_1: Sotañca sotadhātuñca ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na ceva sotaṁ na ca sotadhātu.
ya4.1.2:47.1_0: Kāyadhātuṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso na kāyadhātu, kāyo.
ya4.1.2:47.1_1: Kāyañca kāyadhātuñca ṭhapetvā avaseso na ceva kāyo na ca kāyadhātu.
ya4.1.2:50.1_0: Rūpadhātuṁ ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na rūpadhātu, rūpaṁ.
ya4.1.2:50.1_1: Rūpañca rūpadhātuñca ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na ceva rūpaṁ na ca rūpadhātu.
ya4.1.2:51.1_0: Na saddo …pe… na gandho na gandhadhātūti? Āmantā.
ya4.1.2:53.1_0: Sīlagandho samādhigandho paññāgandho na gandhadhātu, gandho.
ya4.1.2:53.1_1: Gandhañca gandhadhātuñca ṭhapetvā avaseso na ceva gandho na ca gandhadhātu.
ya4.1.2:56.1_0: Attharaso dhammaraso vimuttiraso na rasadhātu, raso.
ya4.1.2:56.1_1: Rasañca rasadhātuñca ṭhapetvā avaseso na ceva raso na ca rasadhātu.
ya4.1.2:57.1_0: Na phoṭṭhabbo …pe… na cakkhuviññāṇaṁ na cakkhuviññāṇadhātūti? Āmantā.
ya4.1.2:59.1_0: Na sotaviññāṇaṁ …pe… na ghānaviññāṇaṁ … na jivhāviññāṇaṁ … na kāyaviññāṇaṁ ….
ya4.1.2:62.1_0: Manodhātuṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso na manodhātu, mano.
ya4.1.2:62.1_1: Manañca manodhātuñca ṭhapetvā avaseso na ceva mano na ca manodhātu.
ya4.1.2:67.1_0: Dhammadhātuṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso na dhammadhātu, dhammo.
ya4.1.2:67.1_1: Dhammañca dhammadhātuñca ṭhapetvā avaseso na ceva dhammo na ca dhammadhātu.
ya4.1.2:71.1_0: Sotadhātu dhātu ceva sotadhātu ca. Avasesā dhātū na sotadhātu.
ya4.1.2:75.1_0: Dhammadhātu dhātu ceva dhammadhātu ca. Avasesā dhātū na dhammadhātu.
ya4.1.2:76.1_0: (Yathā āyatanayamake paṇṇatti evaṁ dhātuyamakepi paṇṇatti. Cakkaṁ bandhitabbaṁ.)
ya4.1.2:80.1_0: Na dhātū na ghānadhātu …pe… na dhātū na dhammadhātūti? Āmantā.
ya4.1.2:84.1_0: Cakkhudhātu dhātu ceva cakkhudhātu ca. Avasesā dhātū na cakkhudhātu.
ya4.1.2:86.1_0: Ghānaṁ …pe… jivhā … kāyo … rūpaṁ … saddo … gandho … raso … phoṭṭhabbo ….
ya4.1.2:92.1_0: Manodhātu dhātu ceva manodhātu ca. Avasesā dhātū na manodhātu.
ya4.1.2:98.1_0: Dhammadhātu dhātu ceva dhammadhātu ca. Avasesā dhātū na dhammadhātu.
ya4.1.2:100.1_0: Cakkhuṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā dhātū na cakkhu, dhātu.
ya4.1.2:100.1_1: Cakkhuñca dhātuñca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva cakkhu na ca dhātū.
ya4.1.2:103.1_0: Sotaṁ ṭhapetvā …pe… ghānaṁ ṭhapetvā …pe… jivhaṁ ṭhapetvā …pe….
ya4.1.2:107.1_0: Rūpaṁ ṭhapetvā …pe… saddaṁ … gandhaṁ … rasaṁ … phoṭṭhabbaṁ … cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe… manoviññāṇaṁ ṭhapetvā …pe….
ya4.1.2:112.1_0: Sotadhātu dhātu ceva sotadhātu ca. Avasesā dhātū na sotadhātu.
ya4.1.2:115.1_0: Dhammadhātu dhātu ceva dhammadhātu ca. Avasesā dhātū na dhammadhātu.
ya4.1.2:118.1_0: Cakkhuṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā dhātū na cakkhudhātu.
ya4.1.2:118.1_1: Cakkhuñca dhātuñca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva cakkhu na ca dhātu.
ya4.1.2:121.1_0: Cakkhuṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā dhātū na cakkhu, dhātu.
ya4.1.2:121.1_1: Cakkhuñca dhātuñca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva cakkhu na ca dhātu.
ya4.1.2:122.1_0: Na dhātū na ghānadhātu …pe… na dhātū na dhammadhātūti? Āmantā.
ya4.1.2:126.1_0: Na dhātū na sotadhātu …pe… na dhātū na manoviññāṇadhātūti? Āmantā.
ya4.1.2:128.1_0: (Yathā āyatanayamakassa paṇṇatti evaṁ dhātuyamakassa paṇṇatti vitthāretabbā.)
